td.content: s:patient presents with critical difficulty seeing at night x 6 days. patient also complains of critical double vision, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. he is a male technical writer aged 54 Ys. he reports having no more than one drink a day Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 71 in, Weight 169 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, subjective refraction myopic shift noted a:Cataracts p:performed subjective refraction, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
